name: HomeGrove
detailed_description:
Welcome to Homegrove!


The MC is a humanoid monster named Happy, but, you can call it Farts if you want. It does seem to do that, after all.

Punch

That's your main attack. Learn to punch well, my children.
Keep your enemies stunned by chaining punches together with correct timing, take them down with a single furious barrage!
Unless they break away...

Grab & Throw

Pick stuff up, and chuck it! Over head, underhand, from the side, you name it, there are a variety of different things to grab, lift, carry, and sling into the air.

Power Up

Discover new items and abilities, use them to solve problems, navigate terrain, and beat up monsters.

Outsmart

Enemies pose unique challenges with distinct strategies, such as strategy A: Punch them in the face.

GET!

Charms and ingredients from the environment, and the corpses of your enemies!
Catch bugs and stuff.

Now you're Cookin'

Mix ingredients to make tasty treats that help in a variety of ways. Maybe feed some monsters?

Night N' Day

Watch the colors change as you play, encounter certain enemies and characters at certain times, sow seeds and reap the fruits.

Play A Tune

Don't forget the flute! TOOT! TOOT!

Explore (the Lore)

What is Happy? Seriously, what the heck? Perhaps the answer to this question and other mysteries lie hidden somewhere in the world of Homegrove.

Jump

If you've read this far, I hope you know what this means.

Technical features to wet your whistle:

  • Super customizable controls, neat!
  • 2x, 3x, 4x, and FULL SCREEN modes, whoa!
  • VOLUME SLIDERS!!!, well hot damn!
